scheme_name: Monthly/ Family Pension to the Freedom Fighters and their Widows
brief_description: "Monthly/ Family Pension to the Freedom Fighters and their Widows" is a social welfare scheme that provides a monthly/ family pension to the freedom fighters and their widows domiciled in the state of Uttarakhand.
detailed_description: "Monthly/ Family Pension to the Freedom Fighters and their Widows" is a social welfare scheme implemented by the Home Department, Government of Uttarakhand. Under this scheme, a monthly/ family pension of ₹25,000/- to the freedom fighters and their widows domiciled in the state of Uttarakhand.
benefits: A Pension of ₹25,000/- Per Month to the freedom fighters and their widows domiciled in the state of Uttarakhand.
eligibility_criteria: Applicant should be permanent resident of Uttarakhand. Applicant should be a freedom fighter/ a widow of freedom fighters.

steps: Step 1: The applicant needs to collect the prescribed application form from the office of the District Magistrate. Step 2: Attach all the mandatory documents (Self-attested, if required) along with the application form. Step 3: Submit the application at the office of the District Magistrate.

documents_required: Application form. Any other documents as required.
